name: Networks Matter
goal: The organization is currently coordinating the GSP Platform. The GSP Platform represents a group of human rights and development organizations, trade unions and other stakeholders seeking to advance human rights and labour rights; as well as promote civic space in the context of the trade preferences of the European Union. Civic space entails the freedom of expression, freedom to peaceful assembly and freedom of association. Signatories currently include. See http://gspplatform.eu/ for more information.
interests: Banking and financial services, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: - EU trade policy: CEPA, GSP Regulation, trade barriers regulation
